abstract: Dominion Resources said Monday that it planned to sell oil and natural gas operations mostly in Oklahoma to Linn Energy for $2.05 billion as it focuses on power generation, transmission and storage.
lead_paragraph: Dominion Resources said Monday that it planned to sell oil and natural gas operations mostly in Oklahoma to Linn Energy for $2.05 billion as it focuses on power generation, transmission and storage.

headline.main: Virginia Utility Sells Oil and Gas Operations
